name: Dice Dungeon (Krish@Gdev)
description:
You are trapped in a dungeon with a mysterious  dice which teleports enemies in to kill you.

Stop the dice from crashing into the walls and it will disintegrate after a while, setting you free.

Instructions:

Use A and S to move and W to jump

You get to hit the dice depending on how many enemies you kill

Hitting the dice will deflect it, if it touches a wall it will spawn enemies and restart the disintegration

Left Click to attack(if you cant attack press r to restart)
